translation.en: Yo, bro.
- What's happening, bruv? - How much you got there?
(Boy) Yeah, sweet.
Look how they get to the top.
(Boy) Shit.
Oh, come on.
- Yo. - (Tareek) Yo, where are you?
Something's about to kick off. You might need to get back here quick.
translation.ko: 일 터질 것 같으니까 빨리 와

translation.en: It's Kamale, man! Come! Come! Fuck!
- What the fuck are you doing here, cuz? - Huh? What?
- (Slap) - Get out my way, man! Shut your mouth!
Say something.
- (Boy) Yo! - Drive the car, man.
Fuck, man!
- What happened? - That man took everything.
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거야? - 다 털어갔어 - 뭐라고?

translation.en: - What? - Kamale and them took everything.
translation.ko: - 다 털어갔어 - 뭐라고? 카말레 패거리가 와서 싹 가져갔다고

translation.en: - What the fuck you talking about? - They had a gun to my face.
translation.ko: 무슨 개소리야? 머리에 총 들이미는데 어쩌겠어?

translation.en: - Everything? - Every fucking thing.
- Fuckin' slapped me in my face, cuz. - So fucking what?
Yo! Wagwan?
He was with all of them. I couldn't do nothing by myself, bruv.
translation.ko: 떼로 몰려와서 어떻게 할 수가 없었어

translation.en: (Boy) This is some joke thing, man.
Mum.
Mum, wake up.
You gonna get out of bed today?
What are you doing? It's too bright! (Tuts)
Do you want me to call a doctor? I can get him to come round.
translation.ko: 의사 부를까? 왕진 오라고 하면 돼

translation.en: You should try and eat something.
You need a new colour in here, Mum. It's making you depressed.
translation.ko: 방 색깔을 바꿔야겠어 색이 칙칙해서 우울한 거야

translation.en: I'm going to paint it for you.
(Gem) Ra'Nell.
Ra'Nell, it's Gem.
(Greene) You owe three grand.
Listen, bruv, we didn't lose the food. Kamale come in and took the food.
translation.ko: 우리가 잃어버린 게 아니라 카말레가 뺏어간 거잖아

translation.en: That's not my problem.
I still gotta tell Bobby that you let Kamale come and take his food away.
translation.ko: 너희 카말레한테 털린 거 바비한테 알려줘야 해

translation.en: Hold on, Lee, we done warned you about Kamale and them London Fields, man.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 카말레랑 런던 패거리 위험하다고 미리 말했잖아

translation.en: Dushane, you're not listening. You owe Bobby three grand.
translation.ko: 두셰인, 귓구멍이 막혔나? 바비한테 3천 파운드 빚졌다고

translation.en: How can we owe three grand
when you're the one supposedly running Summerhouse, bruv?
Who the fuck are you talking to?
Hey, listen, come on, man. We're going to get your money.
translation.ko: 그러지 말고 들어봐 네 돈 찾아올게

translation.en: - When? - A week.
You're gonna keep Bobby Raikes waiting a week for his paper? Good luck.
translation.ko: 바비를 일주일이나 기다리게 만들 셈이야? 잘해 봐

translation.en: (Sully) So, why don't you cover us, then?
I'm not picking up your fucking debt, you prick.
translation.ko: 내가 미쳤다고 그걸 떠맡냐 멍청한 자식아

translation.en: Go on, fuck off. I'm eating. Go on, fuck off.
(Sully) I'm sick of that fat fuck, you know.
translation.ko: 저 돼지 같은 자식 진짜 밥맛없어

translation.en: I'm telling you.
translation.ko: 이건 확실해 저 자식이 있는 한 우리는 늘 밑바닥 신세야

translation.en: We ain't getting nowhere with this guy sitting on top of man like that.
translation.ko: 저 자식이 있는 한 우리는 늘 밑바닥 신세야

translation.en: We need to go and talk to Raikes direct.
Bruv, we can't talk to Raikes direct.
Especially if we ain't got that paper for him.
translation.ko: 돈 못 가져오면 더 말할 것도 없고

translation.en: I don't know who can help man with this, fam.
Femi. Femi.
A lot of the boys, they don't do cards no more.
translation.ko: 이제 카드로 사기 치는 건 한물갔어

translation.en: Some of them even had to get jobs.
translation.ko: 심지어 취직한 업자도 있는데 그게 바로 칩 앤 핀이라

translation.en: It's that chip and PIN, man - it's made it hard for all of us.
translation.ko: 심지어 취직한 업자도 있는데 그게 바로 칩 앤 핀이라 그것 때문에 다들 죽을 맛이야

translation.en: Even the postman. Used to be that thing you could get a postman easy,
but now they're all scared. They check up on them now.
translation.ko: 이제 다들 몸 사려서 꼬치꼬치 따지고 든다고

translation.en: What are you saying? I need this real quick, bruv.
I will talk to my postman.
- Why don't you do that, then? - (Man) Femi!
That didn't sound too positive.
translation.ko: - 어째 안 될 것 같다 - 페미가 해결해줄 거야

translation.en: - He'll come through. - Fucking hope so, mate.
translation.ko: - 어째 안 될 것 같다 - 페미가 해결해줄 거야 그랬으면 좋겠네

translation.en: Nice piece of yam that is, darling.
Here, let me weigh it for you.
Yeah?
You OK?
You want anything else?
Seven pounds, thirty pence. Here, take it, darling.
translation.ko: 더 필요한 거 있어요? 77파운드 30펜스예요 살래요, 말래요?

translation.en: Take it. Pay me next time, yeah?
- (Muttering) - Here.
Stop it. Stop looking at me.
translation.ko: 하지 마 날 그렇게 쳐다보지 마

translation.en: (Muttering)
Stop it.
- (Pigeon fluttering) - Don't look at me.
(Echoing) Are you OK? Can I help you?
(Girl) Oh, my gosh!
(Woman) Do you have a history of mental illness, Lisa?
OK, we think the best thing would be for you to come in.
Is there anyone at home? A husband or a partner?
translation.ko: 집에 누구 있나요? 남편이나 동거인 있어요?

translation.en: Do you have any children?
Lisa?
Because, obviously, if you did, we'll need to see about their care.
translation.ko: 자식이 있으면 위탁 문제를 처리해야 해요

translation.en: I ain't got no children.
It's Precious again, man. She keeps on texting me.
translation.ko: 또 프레셔스네 얘가 계속 문자 보내

translation.en: (Ra'Nell) You're a liar!
Hey, Dushane. Wagwan for my man Ra'Nell?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 뻥을 치냐? 두셰인, 이게 웬일이냐 저기 라넬 온다

translation.en: - Who is he? - Ra'Nell Smith, man. Don't you remember?
translation.ko: - 쟤가 누군데? - 라넬 스미스 기억 안 나? 작년에 자기 아빠 칼로 땄잖아

translation.en: - Shanked up his dad last year. - That's Wayne Smith's kid?
translation.ko: 기억 안 나? 작년에 자기 아빠 칼로 땄잖아 - 웨인 스미스 아들이야? - 그래

translation.en: Yeah, cuz.
Yo! Wagwan, blood.
- Wagwan. - You know who I am, innit?
translation.ko: - 야, 잘 지내냐? - 안녕 - 나 누군지 알지? - 워낙 유명하잖아, 두셰인

translation.en: Everyone knows you, Dushane.
translation.ko: - 나 누군지 알지? - 워낙 유명하잖아, 두셰인

translation.en: Come here.
I want to ask you something.
Ain't it time you started rolling with us?
translation.ko: 너 우리 패거리에 들어올 때 되지 않았냐?

translation.en: - I can't do that. My mum wouldn't like it. - (Kisses teeth) Oh, Lord.
Look, hold that.
What's wrong with you? (Laughs)
- You don't want the money? - All right, all right.
You know what, it's cool. Cool.
Listen, anyone bullying you,
disrespecking you, you let me know, yeah?
translation.ko: 누가 너 괴롭히거나 깔보면 나한테 말해, 알겠냐? 형이 처리해줄게

translation.en: I'll sort that out for you.
Smart youth. Bruv, what's wrong with you?
Whenever someone offers you money, you take it.
Especially when it's someone like Dushane.
translation.ko: 두셰인 같은 사람이 주면 더 그렇고

translation.en: That's you, not me, innit?
(Ra'Nell) Mum. Mum!
Mum!
I don't smell no jerk chicken, bruv. She's not even here, bruv.
translation.ko: - 저크 치킨 냄새 안 나는데 - 아무도 없어

translation.en: Stop. You all right?
You wanna go down the chippy and get something to eat?
translation.ko: 먹을 거 사러 튀김 가게 갔다 올까?

translation.en: No, man. I'm gonna wait for my mum. You go, innit.
No, it's cool, I'll wait with you.
Gem.
Gem, wake up.
Gem, you should go home, man.
- See you in the morning. - See you in the morning.
Hello, Mum, it's me. Where are you and when are you coming home?
translation.ko: 엄마, 어디 있어? 집에 언제 올 건데?

translation.en: Yo, brother.
It's a good address. Swiss Cottage.
£5,000 on there. PIN, code 10, everything.
translation.ko: 거기 5천 파운드랑 - 핀, 텐코드까지 다 있어 - 그래, 좋네

translation.en: - That's cool. - You have something for me, huh?
translation.ko: - 핀, 텐코드까지 다 있어 - 그래, 좋네 - 거저먹을 생각은 아니지? - 나중에 챙겨줄게

translation.en: - I will have. - (Chuckles) What?
translation.ko: - 거저먹을 생각은 아니지? - 나중에 챙겨줄게 뭐라고?

translation.en: Bruv, give me three days, I'll get that for you.
Listen, are you trying to boy me off? I've already paid my postman.
translation.ko: 나 엿 먹이냐? 배달부한테 벌써 돈 줬어

translation.en: Yo, yo, yo. What the fuck's your problem, blood?
We ain't taking no risks.
It's man that's putting in the work out here.
- Three days, fam. - I want my money, Dushane.
- It's free money, man. Chill out. - Fuck that. Fucking ponce.
translation.ko: - 공돈이잖아, 열 내지 마 - 시끄러워, 나쁜 자식

translation.en: - (Leon) All right, Kerry? - Hiya. I'm fine. How are you?
(Leon) Anything I need to know for today?
Erm... Nope. It's all exactly the same as yesterday.
translation.ko: - 새로운 소식 있어요? - 아뇨 - 어제랑 똑같아요 - 잘됐네요

translation.en: (Leon) Cool.
Lisa?
Lisa.
Lisa, it's Leon.
When did you come in here, Lise?
Lisa, how long you been in here?
Someone looking after Ra'Nell?
Is someone looking after Ra'Nell?
Lisa.
(Ra'Nell) What you doing, man? We're gonna need brushes, innit?
You know what, fam, I can't even afford this.
Shit, they're taking the piss.
(Woman) Ra'Nell?
- Hello, Ra'Nell! - Oh, you all right, Heather?
translation.ko: 라넬, 안녕? - 헤더 아줌마, 잘 지내시죠? - 잘 지내니?

translation.en: - You all right? - Mm-hm.
translation.ko: - 헤더 아줌마, 잘 지내시죠? - 잘 지내니?

translation.en: - What you doing? - Painting my mum's room.
- What colour? - Loyal wheat.
That's nice.
Are you pregnant or just fat?
translation.ko: 임신한 거예요? 아니면 그냥 살찐 거예요?

translation.en: Hey, shut up, man. Seven months. Only another two to go.
- Have you done the scan? - Listen to you,
talking about scans and stuff.
What do you need all them lights for?
I'm doing up a flat and there's not much natural light in there.
translation.ko: 아파트 꾸미는 중인데 햇빛이 잘 안 들어서

translation.en: Be well bright with all of them.
Yeah. I'm guessing it will be.
translation.ko: - 그걸로 밝아지면 좋겠네요 - 그래 아마 그럴 거야

translation.en: - You boys got five minutes? - Yeah.
Come on, you can help me put this stuff in the car.
translation.ko: 가자, 아줌마 차에 짐 좀 실어줘

translation.en: Here, take that. No, you're all right.
- Go on, take it. - Thank you.
- What you doing? - Oh, he's all right. You deserve it.
translation.ko: - 네가 왜 받아? - 괜찮아, 받을 만하잖니

translation.en: Thank you, boys.
- Say hello to your mum for me. - Yeah, I will.
- She's a MILF. - Shut up, man.
What? So, you're telling me you wouldn't bang that, nah?
(Man) Yeah.
Flat this big, you get a very good crop. Very good crop.
translation.ko: 이 정도 아파트면 잘 키울 수 있겠어요

translation.en: What's the matter? Don't... Don't worry.
You don't have to do nothing. I take care of everything.
translation.ko: 그냥 보고만 있어요 내가 다 처리할 테니까

translation.en: Cool.
translation.ko: 그냥 보고만 있어요 내가 다 처리할 테니까 그래요

translation.en: It's Ra'Nell, right? Do you remember me? You're a friend of my dad's.
I was a friend of your dad's. I ain't seen Wayne in a long time.
translation.ko: 예전에나 그랬지 너희 아빠 안 본 지 한참 됐다

translation.en: (Ra'Nell) How do I know you're not lying?
You don't. You just have to trust me.
translation.ko: - 정말인지 어떻게 알아요? - 넌 모르지 아저씨 믿어야 해

translation.en: - Listen, I'm here about your mum. - What about my mum?
translation.ko: - 너희 엄마 때문에 왔어 - 우리 엄마가 왜요?

translation.en: She's OK, but she's in hospital.
What do you mean, she's in hospital?
Don't worry. She's not physically sick or nothing.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마라 어디 아픈 건 아니야

translation.en: She just needs time to rest.
She'll be all right. I brought you some jerk chicken.
translation.ko: 괜찮을 거야 너 주려고 저크 치킨 가져왔어

translation.en: You better save me some, you know.
I'm guessing you don't wanna stay with your dad?
No. I don't even know where the fuck he is.
Thing is, if you ain't got no one to stay with, no family or nothing,
they're gonna put you into care.
translation.ko: 가족이 없으면 널 시설로 보낼 거라는 거야

translation.en: That's why your mum never said anything to the doctors about you.
translation.ko: 그래서 너희 엄마가 네 얘기는 입도 뻥긋 안 했어

translation.en: I'm not going into care. I can look after myself.
translation.ko: 시설엔 안 갈 거예요 제 앞가림은 제가 해요

translation.en: But she might not be back for a while. I said I ain't going into care!
translation.ko: - 엄마는 시간이 좀 걸릴 거다 - 시설에는 안 간다니까요

translation.en: OK. This is what we're gonna do.
You're gonna stay here, but under my terms, yeah?
translation.ko: 집에서 지내라 근데 아저씨랑 약속 지켜야 해

translation.en: Right, you go to school every day.
You keep yourself and this place clean for your mum.
translation.ko: 너랑 엄마를 위해서 집 청소 깨끗하게 하고

translation.en: No hanging out on the estate, and you go to your bed at night, early.
translation.ko: 딴 데서 놀지 말고 밤에는 일찍 자

translation.en: That's the deal.
- Can you cook? - A bit.
OK. I can bring you some stuff you can heat up.
When do I get to visit her?
That's gonna be tricky,
cos if the doctors see you, they put two and two together and...
translation.ko: 의사가 널 보면 이런저런 의심을 할 거야

translation.en: I'll see what I can do.
If I write a note, would you give it to her?
Yeah, course.
Now eat up.
(Lee) What the fuck's he doing here?
- Who's that, Lee? - Fuck. Soldier out of Summerhouse.
- Is he the one that lost that bit of grub? - Yeah, that's the cunt.
translation.ko: - 물건 털린 그 녀석인가? - 네, 나쁜 자식이죠

translation.en: You've got a fucking cheek, in't ya? What you doing?
translation.ko: 얼굴에 철판 깔았냐? 여기는 왜 왔어?

translation.en: - Came to give Bobby his paper. - Give me the fucking money.
translation.ko: - 바비한테 돈 주러 왔어 - 나한테 내놔

translation.en: I wanna give it to him personally.
Give me the fucking paper. Go on, go on, gimme.
translation.ko: - 내가 직접 줄래 - 나한테 내놓으라고 얼른 줘

translation.en: I think Bobby wants to see me. Fuck you, you cunt.
translation.ko: - 바비가 오라는 것 같네 - 엿 먹어라, 나쁜 자식아

translation.en: (Raikes) Sit down.
What's your name, kid? Dushane.
- You got some paperwork for me? - Yeah.
- It don't wanna be shy. - It's all there, man.
translation.ko: - 모자라면 큰일 날 텐데 - 다 가져왔어요

translation.en: You got two minutes. Let me ask you a question, yeah?
Why we gotta make it so hard for the customers?
translation.ko: 왜 이리 복잡하게 고객을 잡아야 하죠?

translation.en: Feds know people are buying and selling in Hackney, right?
translation.ko: 경찰도 해크니에 있는 딜러와 고객 다 알잖아요?

translation.en: Now as long as we don't make no noise, they don't really care.
translation.ko: 저희가 말썽만 안 피우면 신경도 안 쓸 겁니다

translation.en: It's part of the fabric of life, innit?
Fabric of life? Look, this is all very interesting, but...
translation.ko: 서로 엮인 삶? 꽤 흥미롭기는 한데...

translation.en: Let me run Summerhouse.
That position's filled. You know that.
I ain't dubbing Lee or nothing, yeah?
But you think Kamale and them London Fields boys
translation.ko: 근데 리가 제대로 했으면 카말레랑 그쪽 패거리가

translation.en: could come into Summerhouse if he was doing his job right?
I know you and Lee are tight,
but that don't change what happened, man, and it shouldn't have happened.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 다를 거 없습니다 벌어지면 안 되는 일이었죠

translation.en: So, what do you want from me? Eight ounces of brown to start.
Eight? I can move that easy.
So, you wanna do business with me, yeah?
- That's right. - Why?
translation.ko: - 나랑 거래하겠다? - 맞아요 - 어째서? - 살고 싶으니까요

translation.en: - I want a life. - But you're breathing, ain't you?
translation.ko: - 어째서? - 살고 싶으니까요 - 숨은 잘 쉬고 있잖아? - 잘 살고 싶어요

translation.en: I want a good life.
translation.ko: - 숨은 잘 쉬고 있잖아? - 잘 살고 싶어요

translation.en: I was born and bred in Summerhouse. I'm 26 years old.
I got nothing else to be except this.
I was born in Summerhouse.
We gonna do business or what?
(Vincent) Light very important.
Always keep this distance from here.
What about the water?
Water, water is here. Pump is always on.
translation.ko: - 물은요? - 물은 여기 있어요 펌프는 늘 켜놔요 식물 키우는 거 좋아해요?

translation.en: - Do you like gardening? - Me? Yeah, I love gardening.
translation.ko: 펌프는 늘 켜놔요 식물 키우는 거 좋아해요? 좋아하는데 토마토 재배랑은 다르잖아요?

translation.en: - It's not like growing tomatoes, is it? - Same thing, but different.
translation.ko: 좋아하는데 토마토 재배랑은 다르잖아요? 같으면서도 달라요

translation.en: Well, you don't go to prison for growing tomatoes in a window box, do ya?
translation.ko: 화분에 토마토 기른다고 감옥 가진 않잖아요?

translation.en: Most important thing not to go to prison - smell.
translation.ko: 제일 중요한 건 안 걸리는 겁니다, 냄새요

translation.en: - Smell? - Smell from the plant, very strong.
Extractor. Take away the smell.
- How long's it take to grow a crop? - Thirteen weeks.
Now, when you grow you must always have shiny leaf, dark green.
translation.ko: 키울 때는 잎이 늘 반질거려야 해요 진녹색이 좋고 옅거나 노랑이면 양분이 부족한 겁니다

translation.en: Pale no good. Yellow no good. Means you not feed it right.
translation.ko: 진녹색이 좋고 옅거나 노랑이면 양분이 부족한 겁니다

translation.en: Every day you check the pH water.
Temperature.
translation.ko: 온도를 확인하고 펌프가 계속 돌게 해요

translation.en: Make sure pump is always working. Shiny, shiny leaf, huh?
translation.ko: 온도를 확인하고 펌프가 계속 돌게 해요 윤기 나는 잎이에요 수확하면 내가 살게요

translation.en: You want, I buy your crop off you.
translation.ko: 윤기 나는 잎이에요 수확하면 내가 살게요

translation.en: - What you gonna give me for it? - I give you good price.
translation.ko: 뭘 해줄 건데요? - 값을 잘 쳐주면 되죠 - 얼마나요?

translation.en: - What price? - Good price.
translation.ko: - 값을 잘 쳐주면 되죠 - 얼마나요? 잘 쳐줄게요

translation.en: No, no, Vincent, I need the exact price. I need to have this all worked out.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 빈센트 정확한 금액을 알아야 해요

translation.en: Ah, don't worry. I give you good price, all right?
- (Dushane) What's going on? - What's happening? All right?
- What's this? - There's a name in there.
It's got to be this one, the right one.
(Leon) You all right, girl? What you saying?
Ra'Nell put some clothes together for you. And he asked me to give you this.
(Leon) He's a good kid, you know?
(Chuckles) He's got some fire in his belly. He's all right.
Listen, Lise.
They've got you on all these drugs to stabilise you, and that's all right for now,
translation.ko: 널 안정시키려고 병원에서 온갖 약을 쓰는데 당장은 괜찮아

translation.en: but I've seen too many people stay doped up on these things,
translation.ko: 근데 약물치료에 중독되는 환자도 꽤 많고

translation.en: and that ain't no way to get better, trust me.
translation.ko: 그걸로 절대 나아지지 않아 날 믿어

translation.en: So, when you're feeling up to it, I want you to come to the gym and train.
translation.ko: 그러니까 기력 회복되면 나랑 운동하러 가자

translation.en: It'll do you good. And don't worry about Ra'Nell.
translation.ko: 효과가 있을 거야 라넬 걱정은 하지 말고

translation.en: I'll look after him. He'll be all right.
If your mum doesn't come home tonight, are you gonna call someone?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에도 엄마 안 오시면 누구한테 연락할 거야?

translation.en: I don't need to. I already know where she is.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 돼 엄마 어디 있는지 알았어

translation.en: Where?
Come on, tell me.
- They put her in a mental hospital. - No.
When's she coming home? I don't know.
Shit.
- She'll be all right though, yeah? - Yeah, hopefully.
Can't even visit her.
translation.ko: 면회도 안 된대 걸리면 시설에 보낸다더라

translation.en: If they found out about me, they'd put me in care.
translation.ko: 면회도 안 된대 걸리면 시설에 보낸다더라 - 아무한테도 말하지 마 - 안 할게

translation.en: So don't be telling no one, though. I won't.
(Gem) Marnie!
(Man) Keep your head still, my bro.
(2nd man) I'm talking.
How am I supposed to talk if I can't move my head?
translation.ko: 말을 해야 하는데 어떻게 머리를 안 움직여?

translation.en: (Barber) I can talk without moving my head. Watch me. Did you see my head move?
translation.ko: 난 그럴 수 있어 봐, 내 머리가 움직이냐?

translation.en: That's cos you're chatting shit, cuz.
translation.ko: 넌 거지 같은 소리나 지껄이니까 그렇지

translation.en: My head moves when I talk cos I talk important shit.
translation.ko: 난 중요한 얘기를 하니까 머리가 움직이는 거야

translation.en: And don't use that as an excuse to fuck up my hair.
translation.ko: 움직여서 내 머리 망쳤다고 핑계 대지 마

translation.en: You're done.
Nah, nah. I'm not done, fam, look. Symmetry, fam.
Listen, I'm just about to get in the car, innit, so... I'm gonna have to hang up.
translation.ko: 이제 차에 탈 거라 전화 끊어야겠다

translation.en: Bye.
- (Sully) Yo, are you Ross, yeah? - Who's asking?
- (Ross groaning) - (Dushane) Just come on, man.
- Sully, would you hurry up? - (Sully) Fucking hold him down.
translation.ko: 왜 그래? 빨리해 이 자식 좀 누르라고

translation.en: Keep still, man.
(Muffled groaning and screaming)
(Dushane) Yo, fam, just come on, man. What's wrong with you?
(Sully) Fucking hold him down.
- (Snap) - (Muffled groans)
- What? What? - It's the wrong finger.
Bruv, they ain't gonna know the fucking difference.
Course they're gonna know the fucking difference, bruv. Look!
They look the same to me. You crazy?
I'm telling you now, we need to get the right finger.
You're saying you want me to cut the other finger off now?
It's attention to detail, innit? Go on.
- You're sick, you know, man? - Come on, bruv.
(Raikes) My sister's kid, 17 years old, got a glass eye,
translation.ko: 내 여동생 아들이 17살인데 가짜 눈을 꼈어

translation.en: all because this got poked in his face.
Now a situation has become vacant. My mate here, Lee...
translation.ko: 이제 공석이 생겼네 - 내 심복 리는 승진할 거다 - 축하해

translation.en: well, he's moving up.
translation.ko: - 내 심복 리는 승진할 거다 - 축하해

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.ko: - 내 심복 리는 승진할 거다 - 축하해 이제 너희 둘이 나랑 사업할 수 있다는 거지

translation.en: So that means that you two and me are gonna do business together,
translation.ko: 이제 너희 둘이 나랑 사업할 수 있다는 거지

translation.en: but we're gonna do business exactly how I say.
translation.ko: 근데 정확히 내 식대로 할 거야

translation.en: Because what this is is a special relationship.
I'm trusting you with my food. You can trust us.
translation.ko: - 내 약을 믿고 맡긴다 - 믿으셔도 됩니다

translation.en: I know that I can trust you
because I know who your family are.
Give 'em the parcel.
Bring me the paper in a week. What about Kamale?
What about him?
translation.ko: 그 자식? 이제는 너희가 써머하우스 담당이잖아

translation.en: You boys are running Summerhouse now. Whatever you feel to do, fine by me.
translation.ko: 그 자식? 이제는 너희가 써머하우스 담당이잖아 하고 싶은 대로 해 난 상관없어

translation.en: What you saying, cuz? No, chill, man. Jam.
I just come to tell you we're running Summerhouse now, ya hear me?
translation.ko: 이제 써머하우스는 우리 거라고 알려주러 왔다, 알겠냐?

translation.en: So all them little stunts you pulled before,
translation.ko: 갑자기 쳐들어와서 물건 털어가는 미친 짓은

translation.en: coming in and taking man's food and all that, can't happen again. Understand?
translation.ko: 갑자기 쳐들어와서 물건 털어가는 미친 짓은 두 번 다시 하지 마, 알겠어? 리 그린은?

translation.en: So what about Lee Greene?
Don't worry about Lee Greene. He's moved on.
- (Dushane) What ya doing, man? - (Slash)
translation.ko: - 무슨 짓이야? - 써머하우스에 얼씬도 하지 마

translation.en: Stay the fuck out of Summerhouse, ya listening?
translation.ko: - 무슨 짓이야? - 써머하우스에 얼씬도 하지 마 - 제기랄 - 명심하라고

translation.en: What you do that for?
If you know me, I don't come nowhere just to talk, blood.
translation.ko: 나 알잖아 얘기나 하자고 찾아오진 않아

translation.en: Anyway, I saw his face. He weren't even listening to you. (Snorts)
translation.ko: 그 자식 얼굴 보니 네 말 귓등으로도 안 듣더라

translation.en: You know what you started now, innit?
He already started it.
Two, yeah? All right, holler, innit.
(Chatter)
Nobody move!
(People groaning and laughing)
(Dushane) Listen, we've got this place in Finchley, it's all set up. Ready to go.
translation.ko: 핀칠리에 자리 물색해놨어요 갈 준비 됐습니다

translation.en: (Raikes) Going country. That's full on, that's 24/7.
You sure your youngsters can handle that sort of pressure?
translation.ko: 그렇게 힘든데 꼬맹이들이 견딜 수 있겠어?

translation.en: They know what they have to do. How much do you want?
translation.ko: - 다들 자기 임무를 알아요 - 얼마를 원해?

translation.en: Box of each.
(Raikes) That's a lot of money.
You better know what you're doing.
(Men chatting quietly, chuckling)
Oi! Come, man, let me talk to you quickly.
See Dris, Chantelle. They're making mad paper, you know?
translation.ko: 드리스랑 샨텔 봐봐 쟤들 돈 진짜 많이 벌어

translation.en: Even little Michael, 10 years old. Making his money.
What are you lot saying? Wanna make some paper?
- Yeah, I do. - What about you, Ra'Nell?
Look, bruv, I know your mum's in the Hackney nuthouse, you know.
translation.ko: 네 엄마 해크니 정신병원에 입원한 거 알아

translation.en: (Gem) Bruv, I didn't say nothing. I swear.
(Chuckling) Don't worry, bruv, this is Summerhouse, word gets around.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마 이 동네는 비밀이 없잖아

translation.en: Look, I know how it is with family and that. You get me?
I know your daddy ain't around, but we are.
translation.ko: 네 아빠는 안 계시지만 우리가 있잖아

translation.en: When your mum comes out, it's you that has to step up for her like a man, you know.
translation.ko: 엄마 퇴원하시면 네가 가장 노릇 해야지

translation.en: Got to take care of her and all that. Listen, we're your family now.
translation.ko: - 엄마 돌보고 생활도 책임지고 - 이제 우리는 한 가족이다

translation.en: Right, think of all these lot as your cousins, you get me?
I'm gonna look out for you, fam. Don't worry.
translation.ko: 뒤는 내가 봐줄 테니까 걱정하지 말고

translation.en: (Sully) Hey, what. I'm gonna pick you lot up, innit.
- When? - When you see me, that's when it is.
Fucking when, man, when. Just be ready.
translation.ko: 정신 나간 자식, 언제는 무슨 준비나 해

translation.en: Bruv, we're gonna be rich.
(Sighs) Fuck! (Sully) Do you know how gay you look?
translation.ko: - 젠장 - 너 게이 같은 거 알아?

translation.en: Bruv, shut the fuck up. You know how fucking skinny you look, huh?
translation.ko: 닥쳐, 넌 진짜 볼품없는 거 알아?

translation.en: - Prick. - (Dushane) You think I'm joking?
How you gonna defend yourself on the roads with them fucking skinny arms?
translation.ko: 그 빼빼 마른 팔로 길바닥에서 어떻게 버티냐?

translation.en: (Sully) It's why I've got a knife. So I don't have to do none of this gay shit.
translation.ko: 그래서 칼 있잖아 난 이런 게이 짓 안 해도 돼

translation.en: - What you saying, Shane? - Hey, what you saying, man?
Dushane, I need to ask you a favour, man. Go on. What is it?
translation.ko: - 두셰인, 부탁 하나 하자 - 그러세요, 뭔데요?

translation.en: I'd really appreciate it if you left Ra'Nell Smith alone.
What's Ra'Nell Smith got to do with you? His mum's a good friend of mine.
translation.ko: - 걔랑 무슨 상관인데요? - 걔 엄마가 나랑 친한 친구야

translation.en: So what, bruv? Still ain't got nothing to do with you.
Like, this is our thing.
If we wanna talk to someone, we're gonna talk to them.
translation.ko: 우리가 누구랑 말하고 싶으면 하는 거죠

translation.en: I'm sorta looking after him while his mum's in hospital.
I promised her I'd keep him out of trouble.
translation.ko: 무사히 잘 있게 하겠다고 애 엄마랑 약속했다

translation.en: Didn't you just hear what he said?
Think about it, yeah? Plenty other kids out there, man.
(Sully) Hope you ain't thinking about it. Who the fuck does he think he is?
translation.ko: 신경 쓰지 마 자기가 뭐라도 되는 줄 아나?

translation.en: You know what, leave Ra'Nell out this time, yeah?
What, cos of him?
It's more trouble than it's worth. Fuck him.
translation.ko: 괜히 골치 아플 수도 있어 엿 먹으라고 해

translation.en: Come.
Get on this, jump on this bar.
(Sully) We're done. Got shit to do.
- (Dushane grunting) - Come on, man.
(Sully) What you saying?
Yo! You good?
- All right. - (Sully) All right, get in the car, man.
translation.ko: - 잘 있었냐? - 응 - 차에 타 - 개 데려가야 해

translation.en: I need to get my dog.
You wanna make money or you wanna take your dog for a walk?
translation.ko: 돈 벌래? 아니면 개 산책이나 시킬래?

translation.en: (Laughs) Exactly. Get in the car.
- No, not you, bro. - What are you talking about?
You ain't coming. But Dushane said I should.
Dushane nothing. You got a problem, talk to Leon, yeah?
translation.ko: 그 자식은 쪽도 못 써 불만 있으면 리언한테 얘기해

translation.en: (Sully) Yo.
Stop making so much fucking noise, man.
(Laughing) Only joking, man. Fucking hell, don't you talk?
(Chantelle) He's all right, man.
(Sully) Chantelle, tell him I'm only joking.
(Tareek) Gem, you ever been country before? I went once to Hampshire with my nan.
translation.ko: - 젬, 시골에 가본 적 있어? - 할머니랑 햄프셔에 한 번 가봤어

translation.en: (Tareek) A country shop with your nan or something.
(Sully) He did not just say that.
(Sully) Nah, nah, nah, that's not the kinda country he's talking about.
translation.ko: 아니야, 얘 지금 다른 곳 얘기하는 거야

translation.en: Hey, listen, Gem, this is a whole 'nother country, you know.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 젬 지금 가는 곳은 전혀 달라

translation.en: It's not that place you been before, trust me.
He was talking about his fucking nan.
translation.ko: 이 자식이 황당하게 할머니 얘기를 하네

translation.en: You OK?
(Boy) Burst his brain, bruv.
Head popped. Pop him.
This is shit, man. You can't even fucking play.
translation.ko: 겁나 구리네 너 제대로 쏘지도 못하잖아

translation.en: This thing's hard, bruv. You get sore thumbs.
(Chatter)
Good?
translation.ko: 이제 형이 해 다들 잘 있었지?

translation.en: (Dris) Now you lot listen, yeah? This is Robert, my best fiend.
translation.ko: 안녕 다들 주목 이쪽은 내 단골, 로버트야

translation.en: Hey, wake up, man, what's wrong with you? Gazing on the game, man.
translation.ko: 정신 좀 차려, 왜 그래? 게임을 보라고

translation.en: You get me? He's gonna let everyone know we're here, you get me?
translation.ko: 저 자식이 우리 왔다고 소문낼 거야, 알겠지?

translation.en: Get the line banging. Ain't that right, Robert?
translation.ko: 정보를 쫙 흘려 안 그래, 로버트?

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah? Go sit over there or something, man.
translation.ko: 응? 그렇지? 저쪽 가서 앉아 있어 정신 좀 차려

translation.en: Fuck, man.
translation.ko: 그렇지? 저쪽 가서 앉아 있어 정신 좀 차려

translation.en: Make sure you bring my lighter back as well.
(Chantelle) Nice to meet you, fam. Fuck, say something.
translation.ko: 만나서 반가워 젠장, 말 좀 하지

translation.en: This place is dirty.
- I got that, fam. - (Boy) Well done, bruv.
Listen, man's gonna blitz this place quick, you get me?
translation.ko: 곧 약쟁이가 떼로 몰려올 거야, 알겠지?

translation.en: In and out, yeah? Before the feds even know man's here.
translation.ko: 시도 때도 없이 말이야 경찰이 눈치채기도 전에

translation.en: What you saying, fam? Yo, come here, let me talk to you.
translation.ko: 너는 괜찮아? 이리와, 얘기 좀 하자

translation.en: Come, Rob, get up, man. Go in the other room, man. What's wrong with you?
translation.ko: 로버트, 일어나 다른 방에 가 있어 왜 그래?

translation.en: Sit down there, brother.
Now it's a simple thing, bruv. All you got to remember
is make sure you bring me back the right money every time.
You understand? All right? Otherwise it's gonna get political.
I don't care if it's even, like, five pound. It don't matter.
You get me? It's the principle, all right?
That five pound there represents respect.
Yeah? We're together.
translation.ko: 그 5파운드는 존경의 표시지 한 배를 탔으니 원칙을 어기면 모두에게 미안한 거야

translation.en: Anyone fucks up, it reflects on everyone, you understand?
translation.ko: 한 배를 탔으니 원칙을 어기면 모두에게 미안한 거야

translation.en: All right, man. Now do your thing, man. Go on.
(Sully) Come and get this crack here, man. Fuck all this game shit, man.
translation.ko: 와서 이것 좀 깨봐 더럽게 안 깨지네

translation.en: (Gem) But I just don't get it.
Bruv, look, what you have to do, yeah, is practise with your tongue, innit.
translation.ko: 알았어, 봐봐 우리는 혀만 잘 쓰면 되는 거야

translation.en: Get it all agile. Look, see. Drop to the back like this.
translation.ko: 속도가 생명이지, 잘 봐 이렇게 뒤로 밀어 넣어

translation.en: See? Under your tongue like this. Can you see?
Does it look like I'm holding anything?
translation.ko: 입에 뭐 물고 있는 것 같아?

translation.en: See, because I've got five on this side, got seven on this side here.
If the feds try to stop me, they ain't gonna clock shit in my mouth.
translation.ko: 경찰이 날 잡아도 입속은 신경 안 쓰거든

translation.en: Cos it's all the way back there. See that?
- Mm. - All right, look.
Go on, try it.
At the back, under your tongue. Way back.
translation.ko: 혀 밑으로 깊숙이 넣어, 더 뒤로

translation.en: That's it, yeah, go on. Way down at the back.
- (Coughing) - Shit, what the... Bruv, don't swallow it, bro.
Couple of score bags.
Oi, what's this street called? Just in case I get lost.
translation.ko: 여기가 무슨 거리랬죠? 길 잃어버릴까 봐요

translation.en: Andrews Road, blood.
There you go, I've done your laundry for you.
What did you say to Dushane and them? You had no right.
translation.ko: 두셰인 쪽에 뭐라고 했어요? 아저씨가 뭔데요

translation.en: What was the deal? You can stay here as long as you behave yourself.
translation.ko: 약속이 뭐였지? 얌전하게 굴어야 집에 있을 수 있는 거다

translation.en: Hanging with Dushane and Sully and them, that ain't behaving yourself.
translation.ko: 두셰인 패거리랑 어울리는 건 얌전하게 구는 게 아니지

translation.en: You're a hypocrite. You were on the roads with my dad, right?
translation.ko: 아저씨는 위선자네요 우리 아빠랑 거리 생활했잖아요?

translation.en: You were in jail with him, for fuck's sake.
I see you talking to Dushane and Sully and them again,
translation.ko: 또 두셰인 패거리랑 얘기하면 사회복지과에 연락해서

translation.en: I'm calling social services and I'm telling them you're here on your own.
translation.ko: 또 두셰인 패거리랑 얘기하면 사회복지과에 연락해서 너 혼자 집에 있다고 말할 거야

translation.en: What? You'd hurt my mum like that?
Don't you think it would hurt her more, you hanging with them?
translation.ko: 네가 걔들이랑 노는 게 더 속상할 거다

translation.en: (Sobbing) Oh, God, no.
Hey, love. Er, just one. Can I have some?
- Those OK? - (Chantelle) They're good.
Enjoy yourself.
Bruv, kill him. Kill him, otherwise he'll come after you again. Seriously.
translation.ko: 저 자식 죽여 안 죽일 거면 게임 때려치워

translation.en: Yo.
Yeah, fam, what was you looking?
All right, just wait in the same place, yeah?
Mm. Yo. Three on two.
Yo! Yo, fam, come on, man. Three on two for me now, yeah?
Same place, yeah?
Shit.
- Yo. - (Man) Yo, have you got six on two?
- What you want? - Six on two.
- All right, cool. Where you at? - I'm outside.
What the fuck? What you doing outside, bruv?
Yo!
What the fuck they doing coming to the house?
translation.ko: - 그 자식들이 여기 왜 와? - 나도 몰라

translation.en: I don't know. They're outside, bruv.
translation.ko: - 그 자식들이 여기 왜 와? - 나도 몰라 - 밖에 있대 - 가서 처리하고 와

translation.en: Go and sort them out. Tell them not to fucking ever come back again.
translation.ko: - 밖에 있대 - 가서 처리하고 와 다시는 오지 말라고 해

translation.en: Bruv, don't fucking come back to the house, you hear me, yeah?
(Sully) Don't fucking listen. How many times I gotta tell you this?
translation.ko: 말을 안 들어 처먹어 몇 번이나 알려줘야 하냐?

translation.en: Bruv, I don't...
Oi, you idiot,
translation.ko: 이 바보야 다시는 여기 오지 마 또 그러면 나한테 맞는다

translation.en: don't fucking come round our house again or I smack you up, bruv.
translation.ko: 다시는 여기 오지 마 또 그러면 나한테 맞는다

translation.en: - Where's my money? - Open the fucking gate!
- Fuck! - Hurry up. Open the gate.
Open the gate. Hurry up. Hurry up.
(Man) Run him, run him! Nuke him!
(Men shouting)
Hey, yo, country boy!
Hey!
- Oh, you, yeah. - Fuck, no. - (Sully) Big man, yeah? - Get the food, man.
Get the fucking food.
- That's right. - I need it like a fucking bitch.
translation.ko: 빌어먹을, 그래 - 너 싹 털어줄게 - 약 챙겨

translation.en: (Kamale) Get the food.
Fuck, where's the fucking money? Where's the money, B?
translation.ko: - 돈은 어디 있어? - 돈 어디 있어?

translation.en: Where's the fucking money? (Sully) Pick up the money, blood.
Fucking play with money, brother.
(Dushane) You know you better use that right now, you know? Man's coming after you, fam.
translation.ko: 지금 쏘는 게 좋을걸? 너 잡으러 갈 거니까

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yeah.
I ain't got to do that. Bobby Raikes is gonna do that.
translation.ko: 내가 그럴 필요 없지 바비 레이크스가 알아서 할 텐데

translation.en: Both of you.
I'll see you later.
- Hey, cuz, let's go. - Pussies! Pussies!
(Sighs) What the fuck?
Yo, what you doing here?
You know we're fucked now, innit?
You've been robbed twice. What you trying to do, make a habit outta this?
translation.ko: 너희 두 번이나 당했잖아 털리는 게 버릇이야?

translation.en: Gonna get your money back, all right?
You got three days.
You have to be very, very careful.
We can't tell no one,
translation.ko: 아무한테도 말하면 안 돼 특히 엄마한테는 더

translation.en: especially not your mum.
translation.ko: 아무한테도 말하면 안 돼 특히 엄마한테는 더 아줌마 감옥 갈 수도 있어

translation.en: I could go to prison for this.
Go inside and smarten yourself up. I got a surprise for you.
translation.ko: 들어가서 멋 좀 내라 깜짝 선물 있으니까

translation.en: (Sully) We got a snake, bruv.
Gem ain't no snake.
No, I'll tell him to pay. No!
(Sully) We mark Shaun like they marked Chris...
translation.ko: 크리스가 당한 것처럼 우리도 숀을 혼내주자

translation.en: Sends man a message.
